title: skins
body: we need a page in our summoner profile that we need to see what skins we have. thoughts?

replies.body:
People been asking for this for like 2 years. Prob one of those 'oce skin' deals. Its "on the radar" but not a priority. Just something mentioned here and there in a meeting.

Honestly they can simply get rid of the Summoner Spell page. Who looks at that page once your passed level 10 and have all the spells
Am i the only one that actually spent an hour probs more then an hour counting how many champions there are and how many skins i own XD WTF!! i have no life legit..
don't worry man i did it as well, took forever.
I got a skin suggestion Meme Udyr~~ When he like q's   w's   e's   or  r's He says stuff like Such Bird Much Fire,   Very Tiger Lot claw    AND STUFF :D

agreed with! i would also love a total at the bottom of the page on how many we own, also with champions swell cause I'm to lazy to count them all up. but yes awesome idea. UPVOTED
they gave us a free skin
